summary: An escaped convict is out to kill the judge who sentenced him. Two inept detectives are hired to guard the judge.
cast: Stan Laurel|Oliver Hardy|Chester A. Bachman|Wilson Benge|Frank Brownlee|James Finlayson|Viola Richard|Will Stanton|Charley Young|Noah Young
director: Director: Fred Guiol (as Fred L. Guiol)
title: Do Detectives Think?
